meanings.definition: Not told or revealed; kept secret.
meanings.sent1: The untold treasure was hidden deep underground.
meanings.sent2: The detective uncovered the untold secrets of the mysterious case.
meanings.sent3: The untold surprise party was a success, and everyone had a great time.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held an untold sadness that no one else could see.
meanings.sent5: The untold truth finally came to light, shocking everyone involved.

meanings.definition: Too numerous or great to be counted or measured.
meanings.sent1: The untold stars in the night sky sparkled brightly.
meanings.sent2: The untold grains of sand on the beach stretched as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent3: The untold amount of candy in the jar seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent4: His untold wealth allowed him to live a life of luxury.
meanings.sent5: The untold possibilities of the future filled her with excitement.
